title: Home > Divisions > Personnel and Establishment Division > Confidential Section
content: Home > Divisions > Personnel and Establishment Division > Confidential Section

title: Confidential Section - Point 1
content: Maintenance of ACRs/ Annual Performance Appraisal Reports in respect of Section Officers and Officers belong to ex-Cadre posts, Assistants, UDCs, LDCs, Stenographers, PA, PS, PPS, Deputy Directors, Assistant Deputy Directors, Research Assistant, Junior Research Assistants, Computors, Translators, Staff Car Drivers & Canteen employees etc. & also forwarded the ACRs/APARs of CSS/IAS/IES/IDAS/IRAS/IA&AS officers to their respective Cadre authorities.

title: Confidential Section - Point 2
content: Communication of the photocopy of ACR/ APAR including the overall grade and assessment of integrity to the concerned officers/ officials from the reporting period 2008-2009 onwards.

title: Confidential Section - Point 3
content: Consideration of adverse remarks, if any representation received from the individuals on or before fifteen days from the date of disclosure of ACR/ APAR.

title: Confidential Section - Point 5
content: RTI Matters relating to above subjects.
